title: Fragment, 1770–90
medium: Block-printed on cotton plain weave foundation.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 46 x 91 cm (18 1/8 x 35 13/16 in.)
description: Alternation of floral stripes and figurative stripes. In the figurative stripes there is an alternation of two scenes, each involving adults playing with a child dressed as a clown. The figurative stripes are offset; the floral stripes are in straight repeat. Black, two reds, blue and yellow ocher. Piece is shaped like a valance.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 1770–90.
1770–90. Block-printed on cotton plain weave foundation.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-213.
